text: George W. Graham, Jr. (born February 16, 1949) is a former Democratic member of the North Carolina General Assembly.http://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/92434/george-graham-jr# He represented the 12th district. Graham is African-American. ==References== Category:Living people Category:North Carolina Democrats Category:African- American state legislators in North Carolina Category:Businesspeople from North Carolina Category:1949 births Category:21st-century American politicians
title: George Graham (North Carolina politician)
